data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Marc Guehi for Swansea has been booked by Darren England and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 36, Kyle Naughton (Swansea) has received a yellow card from Darren England.
Ryan Bennett (Swansea) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Carrow Road.
Swansea make their first substitution with Matt Grimes replacing Kyle Naughton.
At Carrow Road, Jay Fulton has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 59, The away team replace Kasey Palmer with Viktor Gyokeres.
The home team have replaced Przemyslaw Placheta with Bali Mumba. This is the first substitution made today by Daniel Farke.
Josh Martin is on a sub for Jakob Lungi Sorensen for Norwich.
In the minute 84, Goal! Norwich have got their heads in front thanks to a Marco Stiepermann strike.
Yan Dhanda is replacing Jay Fulton for the away team.
Daniel Farke is making the team's third substitution at Carrow Road with Alexander Tettey replacing Emiliano Buendia.
